key.name: columns
key.description: The number of columns in the dock.

key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of the application icons in pixels.

key.name: icon-padding-base
key.description: Minimum padding (pixels) applied around each icon.

key.name: icon-padding-scale
key.description: Multiplier of icon size used to compute padding.

key.name: background-color
key.description: Hex color code for the dock background.

key.name: background-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the dock background (0.0 to 1.0).

key.name: corner-radius
key.description: Corner radius of the dock background.

key.name: group-corner-radius
key.description: Corner radius of group borders.

key.name: show-on-all-monitors
key.description: If true, the dock will be shown on all connected monitors.

key.name: app-groups
key.description: JSON array of app groups. Each group has: id, name, color, borderColor, borderWidth, opacity, collapsed, apps (array of app IDs).

key.name: enable-groups
key.description: If true, applications will be organized into custom groups.

key.name: group-header-size
key.description: Height of group header labels in pixels.

key.name: group-spacing
key.description: Spacing between groups in pixels.

key.name: show-ungrouped
key.description: If true, apps not assigned to any group will be shown in an "Other" section.

key.name: scale-factor
key.description: Manual scale factor override for HiDPI displays. Set to 0 for automatic detection based on display resolution. Values between 1.0 and 3.0 are typical. For 4K displays, try 1.5-2.0.

key.name: auto-hide
key.description: When enabled, the dock will hide automatically and appear when you move the mouse to the left edge of the screen.

key.name: auto-hide-delay
key.description: Delay in milliseconds before the dock hides after the mouse leaves.

key.name: show-delay
key.description: Delay in milliseconds before the dock shows when the mouse enters the hot zone.

key.name: hot-zone-size
key.description: Size in pixels of the invisible hot zone at the edge of the screen that triggers the dock to appear.

key.name: dock-position
key.description: Position of the dock on the screen. Valid values are: 'left', 'right'.
